thread.title: NYC getaway. Great hotel
thread.title_full: NYC getaway. Great hotel - Review of The Time New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sunnyweather25
title: NYC getaway. Great hotel
text: Very Nicely designed hotel. Great location near Times Square. Modern, Clean and pleasant. Front desk staff is excellent. We asked to be moved to a larger room if possible and they accommodated us. Great location near lots of dining and things to do. Nice quiet room. Great blackout shades. Side of hotel room was great as very quiet. I would recommend this hotel and we will return.
